Citations of Epiverse as a project

  • Fletcher I, The Wellcome Trust (2024). “Co-Designing the Foundations of a Climate Sensitive Infectious Disease Community of Practice [version 1; not peer reviewed].” Wellcome Open Res, 9(92). doi:10.21955/WELLCOMEOPENRES.1115376.1.

  • Lipsitch M, Bassett MT, Brownstein JS, Elliott P, Eyre D, Grabowski MK, Hay JA, Johansson M, Kissler SM, Larremore DB, Layden J, Lessler J, Lynfield R, MacCannell D, Madoff LC, Metcalf CJE, Meyers LA, Ofori SK, Quinn C, Bento AIR, Reich N, Riley S, Rosenfeld R, Samore MH, Sampath R, Slayton RB, Swerdlow DL, Truelove S, Varma JK, Grad YH (2023). “Infectious disease surveillance needs for the United States: lessons from COVID-19.” arXiv preprint.

  • Morgan O, Redies I, Rioja ZBL, Brownstein J, George D, Golding J, Hanefeld J, Horby P, Lee C, Mikhailov D, Philip W, Scarpino S, Tessema SK, Ihekweazu C (2022). “Innovations in public health surveillance: updates from a forum convened by the WHO Hub for Pandemic and Epidemic Intelligence, 2 and 3 February 2022.” Eurosurveillance, 27(15). doi:10.2807/1560-7917.ES.2022.27.15.2200302.
